author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
About a year ago Redis changed from the BSD 3 clause license to a dual license system of RSAL and SSPL and now they've changed again to including the AGPL as a third option

title: Redis Changed There License AGAIN!?!
